column1: The Purple Pig////What can I say that hasn't already been stated about THE Purple Pig.  The meal was absolutely outstanding. We got lucky enough during the evening rush to walk in and grab two bar seats.  The bartenders were attentive and made us several outstanding cocktails.  The whole meal was outstanding
column2: from the pork to the whipped feta (best I have had) but the beets.  I can't say enough about the beet dish which I only ordered because half the bar had them
column3: so they had to be great. They were a perfect dish
column5: I could have just eaten that as my meal
column6: but I had to share it with my business partner :(.  Great experience
column7: and I certainly will be back next time I am in town.
